attributes.action: Remove The S*n Newspaper from our Snapchat.
attributes.additional_details: We have the choice to ignore the printed version of the paper, and we need to be able to do this on our own devices too.  The paper is heavily boycotted in Liverpool anyway and Im sure they will support this petition as well.
attributes.background: Those of you who know of what a pathetic excuse of a newspaper The S*n is, will be as annoyed as me when they have somehow joined up with Snapchat for advertisements.  Im sure there is enough of us out there to get this waste of space removed from something we use everyday.
